long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nova is an AI-powered tool designed to streamline the candidate review process within the recruitment workflow. It integrates with ATS platforms and provides a scoring system to help prioritise and manage high volumes of applicants, allowing recruiters to focus on candidates with the highest potential.
